line_1: Man throws the wimble bait, and greedy woman bites.
line_2: So different nymphs a diff'rent charm invites,

line_1: Man throws the wimble bait, and greedy woman bites.
line_2: A song this one, a daunce that maid delights:

line_1: Or when, more gay, her spritely Satire bites,
line_2: 'Tis not to wound, but to instruct, She writes.
Denote the rage with which he writes,
